rules.content: Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.
When ~ enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control.
At the beginning of you upkeep, if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, populate.
Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.
